website_summaries.verdict: Made of 100% high-quality polyester with a relaxed fit.
pros: Has long sleeves, front pocket, and reflective visibility bands
Many wearers find the fit to be relaxed and comfortable
cons: The visibility bands may be restrictive for larger wearers
Check the sizing chart for optimum fit

customer_reviews.title: My only prob is like in another review the safety reflective sown in tape ...
customer_reviews.text: Iam a big guy 300+ lbs, My only prob is like in another review the safety reflective sown in tape does not flex, which in turn holds tight to my gut. Sure I already know what you thinking (lose weight you fat bastard). LOL Other than that, the shirts I bought 4x are very long ++, and are very breathable (air flows through them very well). My company likes them and wants to buy more for our employees. The only reason for the 4 stars is the reflective tape does not stretch. Price point is spot on, even with my delema I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for big/tall men.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Ordered 3 a few months ago. My husband wears them every. single. day. to work. We've washed them probably 15 times and theyre holding up well. I decided to order again so he has enough to last through the week. He is 6'3" and 280. The 3xl tall fit him well. They're long enough and a little baggy- the way he likes. We live in south Texas where the temps are easily 1000F daily and these protect him from the sun while keeping him cool. It's hard to find safety shirts that are light weight and offer sizes for tall men. These shirts perform well and check off all the boxes on our list.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Coley

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Fit as Expected
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these because the reflective strip around the middle is tight with zero give. Otherwise the shirt fit great and seemed to be good quality. My husband said they were lightweight and breathable. Disappointed they didn't fit right.
customer_reviews.author: Tahleah Clark

customer_reviews.title: 6'0 Tall 220 lbs 2XL too BIG
customer_reviews.text: I am 6'0 ft tall and weight around 220/225 lbs I bought a 2XL I feel its a little to big. I did not return it I am use to bagging shirts but it does run a little to big. Next time around I will order XL.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M

customer_reviews.title: Good shirt for the price. Arrived with a stain.
customer_reviews.text: Buying something that's new, then opening the bag and finding an oil stain/smudge on my brand new shirt is really disappointing. No, I'm not going to bother returning it given the price. But when I buy new, I expect new and I would think decent quality control would have found it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have to get a larger size then normal because reflective strips don't have any stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin G. Potthoff

customer_reviews.title: Safety bright!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit! Bright color! Can be seen on the road while on the Harley!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: This product is great for warmer temperatures of work sites
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for warmer temperatures of work sites. It is not the best for welding, however, because if a stray spark does get to it the fabric melts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shirt
customer_reviews.text: Fit true to size, but the stitching was a little snug.
customer_reviews.author: only1victoria

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Replaced two pieces of clothing for me. Used to where a reflective safety vest on top of whatever I was wearing that day now I just wear this and am a lot more comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Spiridon A.

customer_reviews.title: One great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I ride on local military installations that require a reflective vest and sell them for $85.00 and long sleeves are also required. This serves both purposes plus has a handy pocket for eaasy access to a militaty I.D. I am 6'6" and 300 lbs with a 44" waist. and the XXL fit perfectly with extra long sleeves (38" at least). Amazon comes through again!
customer_reviews.author: RobR

customer_reviews.title: Good material and fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband, and he loves them. Good material as well.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Great work shirt
customer_reviews.text: Fit good sleeves are long enough not to short I’m 6’10” good shirt for work
customer_reviews.author: douglas dilliard

customer_reviews.title: Only problem with the shirt is the material of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Only problem with the shirt is the material of the reflective strips does not stretch, I found it tight around the chest area.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the only down side to the shirt is the mid ...
customer_reviews.text: the only down side to the shirt is the mid stripe, it is connected they need to put a expansion area on the sides under the the sleeves
customer_reviews.author: pat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shirt and fits well. Very bright and reflective, I'm a longshoreman so that is of utmost importance.
customer_reviews.author: D.B.

customer_reviews.title: Have not received this product!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This Item has not been received, It hasn't even shipped!! "Where is my stuff" on Amazon is a joke, it does not address never receiving a product! I have checked with the shipper (FEDEX) and the USPS and it has not shipped!
customer_reviews.author: hoseverdie

customer_reviews.title: These are not tall
customer_reviews.text: Don’t be fooled these are big but not tall as they are advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shirts
customer_reviews.text: Nice shirts with a nice long sleeve. I got 3XL Tall. I’ll buy more
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good price good shirts delivered on time
customer_reviews.text: When I need more. I know where to order from. AMAZON Prime
customer_reviews.author: Anjelo

customer_reviews.title: Never again.
customer_reviews.text: I will never order clothes thru Amazon again.4x looked like a small.
customer_reviews.author: David Pena

customer_reviews.title: Cheap prices and good material
customer_reviews.text: Real visible at night since I work the graveyard shift
customer_reviews.author: BigDawg

customer_reviews.title: Finally 4XLT!!!
customer_reviews.text: The only company in the whole world that makes a for 4X tall.
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy wife

customer_reviews.title: While the shirt was of good quality, the size runs small
customer_reviews.text: While the shirt was of good quality, the size runs small, with no give in the reflective tape area. Would recommend to others who are of "larger size", that the shirt be ordered one size to big so as to fit across the abdomen.
customer_reviews.author: De Dale

customer_reviews.title: its a great shirt! Being its polyester
customer_reviews.text: For the money, its a great shirt! Being its polyester, one needs to be careful when washing them, as stains set in really easy. I treat mine with "Shout" before washing...and they look like new after each wash!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Altenhofen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my husband and he loves them. Wash well and fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Gadwood

customer_reviews.title: This shirt fits him great!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son who is 6' 3" and weighs 170. This shirt fits him great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Shirt fits good on chest and body only problem is arms are about 8 inches too long

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly fine.. these shirts are breatheable perfect for this ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly fine..these shirts are breatheable perfect for this nor-cal weather

customer_reviews.title: OK shirt.
customer_reviews.text: This fit is too large I suggest ordering one size under.
